questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

Multiple IPsec VPNs are formed between two hub-and-spokes groups, and site-to-site between Hub 1 and Hub 2. The administrator configured ADVPN on the dual regions topology.
Which two statements are correct if a user in Toronto sends traffic to London? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: I think correct answer is B,D

Selected Answer: BD
B, D is correct
B,D is correct

Selected Answer: BD
answer is B,D
B,D is correct.
Ans is BD

Selected Answer: BD
B,D refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 207
B and D is correct
B,D refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 207

choices.A: Toronto needs to establish a site-to-site tunnel with Hub 2 to bypass Hub 1.
choices.B: The first packets from Toronto to London are routed through Hub 1 then to Hub 2.
choices.D: Traffic from Toronto to London triggers the dynamic negotiation of a direct site-to-site VPN.
choices.C: London generates an IKE information message that contains the Toronto public IP address.

discussion.content: A and C are correct. All existing sessions are marked as dirty and re-routed via port1 because port2 gets a higher priority value.

Selected Answer: AC
A and C

Selected Answer: AC
AC refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 71
A and C.

Selected Answer: AC
a and C are correct
Guys ans is BC see below

comments.content: My apologies, I think it is AC actually

discussion.content: A and C
A C are correct
checked on P72, it's A and C
I think the correct answer is A,C

choices.C: All the existing sessions using SNAT will be flushed and routed through port1.
choices.B: All the existing sessions will continue to use port2, and new sessions will use port1.
choices.A: All the existing sessions that do not use SNAT will be flushed and routed through port1.
choices.D: All the existing sessions will be blocked from using port1 and port2.

questions.question_text: Which components make up the secure SD-WAN solution?

choices.C: Datacenter, branch offices, and public cloud
choices.B: Application, antivirus, and URL, and SSL inspection

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 11
Correct ans is A
Agree correct answer is A

Selected Answer: CD
CD refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 185
Ans is CD

I think correct answer is C,D
If net-device is disabled, FortiGate creates a single IPSEC virtual interface that is shared by all IPSEC clients connecting to the same dialup VPN. In this case, the tunnel-search setting determines how FortiGate learns the network behind each remote client.

choices.A: There are separate virtual interfaces for each dial-up client.
choices.D: 100.64.3.1 is one of the remote IP address that comes through index interface 1.
choices.B: VPN static routes are prevented from populating the FortiGate routing table.
choices.C: FortiGate created a single IPsec virtual interface that is shared by all clients.
The All_Access_Rules rule load balances Vimeo application traffic among SD-WAN member interfaces.
choices.D: The initial session of an application goes through a learning phase in order to apply the correct rule.
choices.B: SD-WAN rules are evaluated in the same way as firewall policies: from top to bottom.
choices.A: The implicit rule overrides all other rules because parameters widely cover sources and destinations.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
B & D. Top to bottom processing is obvious, the learning phase of the application control is also explained in the study guide.
Learning phase is necessary because when looking at only the IP & port information of the first packet, the application cannot often not be determined. FGT has to look into the payload and potentially also into payloads of further packets until the application can be recognized.

Selected Answer: BD
b and D
B&D. The policies are processed top down (like firewall policies). Because of this, A is incorrect.

B and D
SD-WAN rules are done from top to bottom, and Initial sessions goes through learning phase before forwarding out the correct port.

Selected Answer: BD
BD refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 94

Selected Answer: BD
ans is BD
correct ans is BD

B,D is correct

I think the correct answer is B,D
